Implementation of the API

The ReqHunter API is very short and simple:

  • net.trevize.reqhunter.Requirement: this class is an extension of the RequirementT class that JAXB produces from your XML Schema.
  • net.trevize.reqhunter.RequirementFactory: this class is used by JAXB, you have to specify to JAXB that your implementation of this class is the factory of your type of requirement.

Using these two classes, ReqHunter is able to create, load and store requirements.


Nicolas James 2011-07-19
